document_data.title: Forgotten Realms Omnibus
document_data.author:
[[Ed Greenwood]]
[[R.A. Salvatore]]
[[Geno Salvatore]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Forgotten Realms Omnibus''''' is a collection of comics set in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''. It was published in 2016 by [[wikipedia:en:IDW Publishing|IDW Publishing]].

It is a collection of the ''[[Dungeons & Dragons: Forgotten Realms (comic)|Dungeons & Dragons: Forgotten Realms]]'', ''[[Cutter (comic)|Cutter]]'', and ''[[Neverwinter Saga]]'' series.
